content.Cancel:
You’re {Type} {Amount} Constant at {Price} {Currency} per Constant.

If you want to cancel this order, please click the “Cancel order” button below. Otherwise, please close this window.
content.Approve:
You’re buying {Amount} Constant at {Price} {Currency} per Constant.

If you’ve sent {Total} {Currency} to the seller’s bank account, please click “Confirm payment” below.

Otherwise, please send {Total} {Currency} to the seller’s bank account. Remember to include your reference number in the transfer description.

Bank Name: {bank_name}
Account Name: {bank_account_name}
Account Number: {bank_account_number}
Amount: {Total} {Currency}
Reference: {Reference}

IMPORTANT: If you don’t complete your transfer within 30 minutes, your order will be cancelled. This protects you and our network from misuse.
content.Finish:
You’re selling {Amount} Constant at {Price} {Currency} per Constant.

If you’ve received a bank transfer for {TotalVND} {Currency}, you can now send your Constant to the buyer by clicking the button below.

IMPORTANT: Please do not send your Constant until you’ve received the bank transfer from the buyer. If the buyer doesn’t pay you within 30 minutes of placing the order, please email us at hello@constant.money.

home.blockDesc1: People make smarter investments with Constant.
home.blockCap2: Enjoy an interest rate 60x the national average.
home.blockCap3: We’re building a fairer, freer, financial system.
home.titleBlock4: Why you should invest with Constant.
home.titleCap4: Our investment options all offer fixed returns, and have different levels of flexibility to choose from. Get your money to work for you.

howItWorks.desc1: Choose among our flexible Investment Plans, then make a bank transfer of any amount to the FDIC insured Constant Vault. Your funds will be held in USD, to protect against volatility. We earn you interest and make sure your money is secure, by lending your funds only to borrowers who are willing to overcollateralize.
howItWorks.desc2: No matter which commitment period you choose, returns are paid out daily into a Flexible Account. Flexible means you can withdraw whenever you like, and earn an extra 1% annually. Stay liquid and make profit on your profit.
howItWorks.desc3: Your investment income is in USD, but you can withdraw it to any local bank account at the end of the commitment period. Or you could reinvest it to keep growing your money.

buy.title: Buy
buy.subintroDesc1: Pegged to the most stable, useable currency in the world, Constant never loses value.
buy.subintroDesc2: Every Constant is backed by USD, independently held by a US accredited financial custodian, subject to regular audits.
buy.subintroDesc3: All users are fully FDIC and US treasury insured, regardless of amount.
buy.subintroDesc4: Constant moves instantly from your account to anyone, anywhere in the world. For free.

Thank you!

We’re preparing your funds to be withdrawn to the registered bank account. You should be getting another notification once your withdrawal is in motion. Once you’ve received your funds, please click confirm on the Order History page, so we can finalize the record.

If you do not receive a notification confirming your withdrawal after 30 minutes, please send annie@myconstant.com an email, and we’ll get it sorted for you.

transfer.transferFailed: Failed while transfering, please try again
transfer.subintroDesc1: Constant is a digital currency, so you can send it to anyone, anywhere in the world - within minutes.
transfer.subintroDesc2: You can send any amount of Constant to anyone at anytime, for free.
transfer.subintroDesc3: Unlike other digital currencies, Constant keeps a stable value. This means you can get the equivalent of 1 USD for 1 Constant. In any location, at any time.

constantLoan.title: Fair, fully secured crypto-backed loans.
constantLoan.subTitle:
Our unique loan mechanism protects lenders from risk and secures a 8% annual return. It also delivers a 1% APR for borrowers. How?

Borrowers are required to put down collateral, so there is zero risk for lenders. Collateral doesn’t just sit there either - Constant helps borrowers securely lend out what they put down, so that while they pay interest, they are also earning it. This way, borrowers lower their own interest rate, without harming lender returns.

Turns out, both parties can win.
constantLoan.headLine: Want to pay off your credit cards, medical bills or rent? Simply enter the amount of constant you want to borrow and make a deposit in ETH, which will be held securely in the Constant loan smart contact.

exchange.caption: Crypto-backed loan
exchange.amountLabel: How much do you want to borrow?
exchange.collateralLabel: Collateral required (150% of the loan value)
exchange.toolTipCollateral: This is the amount of collateral required for the {exchangeUnit} loan. Collateral value is based on the current market price of {exchangeRate}.
exchange.moreInfo: Your funds will reach you as soon as your collateral is confirmed on its blockchain.  ETA: 2 minutes for ETH and 10 minutes for BTC.

what.whatDesc0: Our loan mechanism is secured and automated by smart contracts. No lengthy processing times - the money you need is in your account within the hour.
what.whatDesc1: Secure your loan with BTC or ETH and receive USD - all without needing to sell your crypto. Enjoy liquidity without needing to liquidate.
what.whatDesc2: Borrow as much as you want, and take as long as you need. Enjoy flexible repayments and the kindest interest rate on the market.
what.whatDesc3: Constant is for everyone. No credit scoring, background checks or month-long waiting games for approval.

howItWorks.intro:
Deposit cryptocurrency to secure cash, at the best rates on the market.

Need cash? We accept major cryptocurrencies as collateral, in exchange for USD or the equivalent in your local currency. That means you’ll have cash to spend - without needing to sell your crypto.
howItWorks.desc1: How much do you want to borrow? Tell us how much, in your currency of choice.
howItWorks.title2: CHOOSE A COLLATERAL AND A TERM
howItWorks.desc2: Secure your loan with BTC or ETH as collateral. Our calculator will tell you how much you need. Then just pick a loan term you feel comfortable with.
howItWorks.desc3: Within the hour, your USD loan will be accessible from your Constant Flexible Account. Withdraw anytime, to any other bank account.

general.answer1:
Constant is a suite of simple, secure, and rewarding financial services.

Through blockchain technology, we’ve developed a suite of flexible investment products designed to grow your money at a pace that suits you. Whether you’re a seasoned investor or dipping your toe into it for the first time, Constant offers substantial returns with zero risk.

We’ve thrown out credit scoring, paperwork, and fees to give you more of what you deserve – industry-leading rates, risk-free loans, a stable, state-less currency, and free international transfers.

Available all day, every day, anywhere in the world.
general.question2: Can I get a crypto loan?
general.answer2: Yes, anyone with bitcoin or ethereum to put up as collateral can get a crypto loan.
general.answer3:
No. Constant is even better.

We’re 100% digital and open 24-7, so no queuing at bank branches, and no bank holidays.

Our Investment Plans earn you up to 60x more investment income than a typical savings account pays in interest.

We don’t run credit checks for our loans, we don’t give you reams of paperwork to sign, and we are open to anyone, anywhere.
general.answer4: Yes. Funds are held securely in our trust, which is regulated under US law. That’s why we ask you to verify your identity when you withdraw investments to your bank account.
general.answer5: We charge interest on collateralized loans to pay investment income to our investors, and make a very slim profit from the difference.
general.question6: Who are the people behind Constant?
general.answer6: We’re a diverse team of engineers, economists, monetary policymakers, and industry experts. You can read all about our team on .
general.answer7: Everywhere! We are a registered US entity supported by a global team with presences in the USA, Vietnam, and Malta. If you’re in our neighborhood, drop by anytime.

collateral.question1: What assets do you accept as collateral?
collateral.answer1: We only accept bitcoin and ethereum at the moment.
collateral.question2: What happens if my collateral falls in value during my loan term?
collateral.answer2:
If the value of your collateral falls below 70% of the original market rate, we liquidate (sell) your crypto and you can keep the loan without repaying it.

For example, if you borrow $100 and at the time of borrowing your collateral is worth $150, then if it falls below $105, we’ll sell your collateral and you keep the $100.
collateral.question3: Where do you store my crypto collateral?
collateral.answer3: We store your crypto in smart contract escrows on the ethereum blockchain, accessible only by encrypted private keys.
collateral.question4: Is my crypto collateral safe with you?
collateral.answer4: Yes, very safe. Not only is your collateral stored and cryptographically secured on the ethereum blockchain by the collective computing power of the network, but we also encrypt the private keys on our database.

repayment.question1: How do I repay my loan?
repayment.answer1:
Once your loan term ends, you repay us the original loan amount plus interest in Constant, our USD-Backed stablecoin. You can buy Constant direct from us for $1 each, or you can trade on exchanges using cryptocurrency and other fiat pairs.

Either way, simply send your final loan balance in Constant to our web wallet and we’ll return your crypto.
repayment.question2: What happens if I can’t repay the loan?
repayment.question3: Can I repay the loan in another currency?
repayment.answer3: We offer loans in our USD-backed stablecoin, Constant, which you can then withdraw as USD (or local currency). The same happens in reverse. You repay us in Constant (plus the interest) by sending it to our wallet.
repayment.question4: Can I repay the loan in cryptocurrency?
repayment.answer4:
Since we offer loans in our USD-backed stablecoin, Constant, which you can then withdraw as USD (or local currency), you repay us in Constant, too.

You can buy Constant in several ways – through us for fiat currency (we don’t support crypto at the moment) or through exchanges for other cryptos and fiat pairs.
repayment.question5: How long do I have to repay once the loan term is over?
repayment.answer5: Once the loan term ends, you have seven days to repay the loan.
repayment.answer6: Not at the moment, but we’re looking into this.

interest.answer1: Please check our Crypto Loans webpage for the latest interest rates. Rates differ according to the length of term selected.
interest.question2: Why is the interest rate so low?
interest.answer2: Our terms are intentionally short, strict, and simple so we can offer you the best loan rates on the market while still protecting our investors. We don’t waste money on debt collection, reams of paperwork, or other unnecessary bureaucracy. Just cash loans for crypto collateral, all secured by the blockchain.

tech.answer1:
We loan our investors’ funds to you in return for crypto collateral. Everything is done on the Ethereum blockchain, with our smart contract and USD-backed stablecoin powering the agreements.

To get a loan, you must provide bitcoin or ethereum collateral to the value of 150% of your loan amount. This is called overcollateralization and is essential to offer you the best interest rates and to protect our investors.

Your crypto collateral is stored and secured on the blockchain, accessible only through private keys that we encrypt on our database. It remains securely protected by the blockchain until you repay the loan and we return your crypto.

All of our loans are paid out in our USD-backed stablecoin, Constant. You can then withdraw Constant for USD (or local currency) on our website, or trade it for any other currency with our partner exchanges - and spend it however you want. Since we’re loaning you Constant, you repay in Constant, too, which you can buy from us or from exchanges.

Crypto Loans are very simple. If you don’t repay the loan, or if your collateral falls below 70% of its original market value, we keep and sell your crypto. The loan is yours to keep.

Overcollateralization is a safety mechanism designed to give our investors confidence and our borrowers the friendliest rates on the market. Constant Crypto Loans are one of the safest and easiest loans to obtain, manage, and repay.

home.topBannerSubtext: Hold your money in USD and enjoy free international transfers. 100% insured.
home.midBannerTitle: Constant can help you get more out of your money.
home.midBanner0: Protect the value of your money
home.whatTitle: What can you do with Constant?
home.whatDesc1: No matter which commitment period you choose, returns are paid out daily into a Flexible Account. Flexible means you can withdraw whenever you like - or reinvest and make profit on your profit.
home.whatDesc0: Don’t sit on your money. Put it to work. We’re proud of our rates, and we don’t want you to have to wait to enjoy them. Your investment earnings are paid out daily for you to withdraw anytime.
home.whatDesc2: Anyone should have access to better opportunities. Constant is accessible to anyone with an internet connection. Make your first investment in just 15 seconds, anywhere in the world.
home.whatDesc3: You work hard for your money. We make sure it’s taken care of, and you shouldn’t have to pay extra for it. Our Investment Specialists are here to help whenever you need. No commission fees.
home.whatMore0: How we guarantee zero risk high returns
home.whatMore2: How to pick a plan that’s right for you
home.whatMore3: How people are saving with Constant
home.whatStudentTitle: What can you do with Constant?
home.whatStudentSubTitle: Sending or receiving funds internationally can be an absolute nightmare. Here’s the solution.
home.whatStudentDesc0: Constant makes it easier to pay tuition fees, get monthly living expenses, or receive gifts for special occasions. Receive funds from home instantly, for free. You can always convert Constant to USD at any time. 1 Constant = 1 USD, always.
home.whatStudentDesc1: We’re proud of this one. Constant allows you to instantly send your earnings back home, or to anyone, anywhere, at any time. For free. Secured using blockchain technologies, free from centralized control.
home.whatStudentDesc2: Split a dinner bill, pay for room and board, place a fun bet.  With Constant, sending or receiving payments is streamlined, and incurs zero fees.
home.whatStudentDesc3: It’s safe, quick, easy and cost effective to use Constant. Constant is available 24/7 on both web and mobile. No closing times, no bank holidays.

across all your currently active accounts.

referralPage.loginRequired: You need to login to do the action.

faq1.question: What are Constant Referral Rewards?
faq1.answer:
The Constant Referral Reward program earns you extra interest for investing or sharing Constant with friends and family. You earn interest by completing certain actions, such as referring Constant to friends who then sign up, sharing Constant on social media, and investing a minimum of $1,000 or more.

Complete all actions in our Referral Rewards program and you could earn 6% additional interest on your Investment Plans.

faq2.question: How do I earn reward interest?
faq2.answer:
Simple – just complete any of the following actions:

Invest $1,000 or more: 2.5% (payable once).
Refer Constant to friends and family: 0.2% for everyone who signs up (3% maximum).
Share Constant on Facebook: 0.5% (payable once).

Your extra interest will be added to all of your existing Investment Plans, except for the Trial Plan.

faq3.question: Is there a limit on the amount of extra interest I can earn?
faq3.answer:
Yes, once you’ve completed an action or earned the maximum reward for that action, you won’t earn any further interest.

All referral rewards are single use, except referring friends and family where you’ll earn 0.2% for every person who signs up to a maximum of 3%.

faq4.question: Where can I find my referral link?
faq4.answer: Log into your account and go to My Investments. There you’ll find referral and Facebook links to share Constant with anyone you want.

faq5.question: When will I receive the extra interest?
faq5.answer: Immediately. We add your reward interest to all of your fixed Investment Plans as soon as you complete the actions. We’ll notify you by email, too.

faq6.question: Will the interest expire?
faq6.answer: Yes, it will. The referral program lasts 90 days from Mar 15 to June 15. After that, the rate will return to normal.

affiliatePage.headerDescNoLogin: Let’s earn up to 0.15% of volume users made
affiliatePage.headerDescLogined: Welcome to our affiliate program, let’s start to earn
affiliatePage.termConditionDesc:
Agent will immediately earn 5 USD for the first transaction of acquired users. After that, Agent will earn 0.15% of volume users made in that month as commission.

User A conducts the first transaction which is BUYING CONSTANT and the amount must be equal to or greater than 1,000 USD, then Agent will immediately earn 5 USD. After that, User A makes the next transaction as BUYING CONSTANT, and Agent will earn 0.15% of each purchase. Total volume of User A in the month must be greater than 2000 USD. Commission will be paid at the end of the month.

proSaving.agreement: I authorize AngelList in writing to periodically obtain my credit report for a transaction I am initiating. AngelList may use this data and share it with any issuer solely to verify my investor status in compliance with SEC requirements.
proSaving.accreditation_evidence_location: Do you have a U.S. Social Security Number?
proSaving.accreditationAlt: Required by U.S. law for investing in 506(c) fundraisings
proSaving.desc1: We require proof of accreditation from you that meets the more stringent standard the SEC has put in place – the 506(c) standard – which should work for all accredited deals, including ones that publicly discuss their financing.

income.title: Income
income.description: Income of 200k USD, or 300k USD with spouse, in each of past 2 years and expecting same or more this year

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: Net worth of 1M USD, individually or joint with spouse, excluding your primary residence

proSaving.text2: They'll be asked to confirm that they have seen evidence of your claimed status. No documentation required.
proSaving.text3: W2, 1040, other IRS or foreign tax authority document containing salary for the past 2 years (2017 and 2018), or a letter from your lawyer, accountant, investment advisor, or investment broker
proSaving.text4: Upload a statement from a financial institution, asset appraisals, or letter from your lawyer, accountant, investment advisor or investment broker indicating net assets
proSaving.accreditation_evidence_allow_credit_repo: I authorize AngelList in writing to periodically obtain my credit report for a transaction I am initiating. AngelList may use this data and share it with any issuer solely to verify my investor status in compliance with SEC requirements.
proSaving.popover1:
Income Levels must be met for each tax year individually (the SEC does not allow averaging across years)

If married filing jointly, either a joint income of at least 300k USD/year must be shown across spouses or the investing individual's W-2s must show a minimum income of 200k USD/year

If W2's are provided for a married couple, evidence of marriage must be provided (such as joint-filed 1040)

homeWhatwedo.desc:
We are committed to economic freedom. That’s freedom of movement and freedom of choice. We are committed to economic equality. That’s equal accessibility and equal opportunity. In essence, we want to make money more useful, and growth more attainable, for anyone, anywhere in the world.



What does that look like? Fair interest rates. Inclusive loans. A state-less, stable currency that you can invest, borrow, and spend. Transactions secured and carried out collectively by users of the network. A financial solution for the people, made possible by the people.



Constant is proud to be 100% digital, online 24/7. So no waiting for your broker to pick up the phone, no queuing at bank branches, and no bank holidays. Our team of economists, designers, engineers and industry experts write code, policy and efficient software in major cities around the globe. If you’re in the neighborhood, drop by anytime.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.question1: Which countries can I get Constant in?
faqs.answer1: Anywhere in the world. You just need an internet connection.
faqs.answer2: Anywhere in the world. You just need an internet connection.
faqs.question3: Is Constant insured? What if you get hacked, or I can’t convert to USD, or my Constant is stolen?
faqs.answer3:
The US dollars put in escrow are FDIC (Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation) insured. Each account is insured up to 1305,000,000 USD by the independent trust company’s financial institution bond.


Blockchain technology is very difficult to hack, but even if it happens, we can trace the transaction before the hack to see what happened thanks to the immutable blockchain ledger. So, you will get your USD
faqs.question4: Can I see how many Constant are in circulation?
faqs.answer4:
The US dollars put in escrow are FDIC (Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation) insured. Each account is insured up to 1305,000,000 USD by the independent trust company’s financial institution bond.


Blockchain technology is very difficult to hack, but even if it happens, we can trace the transaction before the hack to see what happened thanks to the immutable blockchain ledger. So, you will get your USD
faqs.question5: Is Constant insured? What if you get hacked, or I can’t convert to USD, or my Constant is stolen?
faqs.answer5:
The US dollars put in escrow are FDIC (Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation) insured. Each account is insured up to 1305,000,000 USD by the independent trust company’s financial institution bond.


Blockchain technology is very difficult to hack, but even if it happens, we can trace the transaction before the hack to see what happened thanks to the immutable blockchain ledger. So, you will get your USD
faqs.question6: Can I see how many Constant are in circulation? Can I check the integrity of the
faqs.answer6:
The US dollars put in escrow are FDIC (Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation) insured. Each account is insured up to 1305,000,000 USD by the independent trust company’s financial institution bond.


Blockchain technology is very difficult to hack, but even if it happens, we can trace the transaction before the hack to see what happened thanks to the immutable blockchain ledger. So, you will get your USD

account.question1: Can I open a Constant account in my country?
account.answer1: Anyone can open a Constant account, no matter where you live. All you need is an internet connection.
account.question2: How do I open a Constant account?
account.answer2: Simply register with an email address and password to get started. To withdraw returns from your free $1,000 initial investment, you’ll need to verify your ID, which shouldn’t take more than a few minutes.
account.answer3: You can invest any amount you want. Better yet, once you’ve opened your account, we’ll give you a free initial investment of $1,000 so you can start earning investment income immediately. The $1,000 principal is returned to us at the end of your term (sorry!), but you keep the ROI. Not bad, right?
account.question4: Do you need to verify my identity?
account.answer4: You can open a Constant account without verifying your identity. However, to withdraw earned investment income on your $1,000 initial investment (or any other investment amount), we will need to verify your identity. We do this to protect you from fraud and to comply with financial regulations.
account.question5: How do I reset my password?
account.answer5: Go to the Login page and click “Forgotten your password?”. Then enter your email address and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password. If you can’t see our email after a few minutes, please check your spam/junk folder.
account.question6: Do I need to connect my bank account / bank info?
account.answer6: You don't need a bank account to use Constant. However, if you withdraw your Constant investment income to USD (or local equivalent), you will need to enter the receiving bank account details. For additional security, we don't store this information for future transactions.

initialInvestment.question1: Is the initial investment promotion still available?
initialInvestment.answer1: Yes, the initial investment promotion is available until further notice. We’ll keep it going for as long as we can.
initialInvestment.question2: Am I eligible for this promotion?
initialInvestment.answer2: As long as you’re a new customer and haven’t accepted an initial trial investment before, you are eligible.
initialInvestment.answer3: While we’d love to give you $1,000, we can’t. The $1,000 will be returned to us at the end of your commitment period, but you keep the returns, which is still a pretty good deal.
initialInvestment.question4: How can I track the returns from this promotion?
initialInvestment.answer4: Just log into your account and click Your Investments. Total earned investment income is on the top right of the dashboard.
initialInvestment.question5: What happens at the end of my commitment period?
initialInvestment.answer5: At the end of the term, we’ll pay you the total profit (assuming you haven’t withdrawn it already) and the $1,000 principal will be returned to us. Please note that we will need to verify your identity before you can withdraw investment income to your bank account. This protects you from fraud and complies with financial regulations.
initialInvestment.question6: Can I invest more into the initial investment promotion?
initialInvestment.answer6: No, but you can invest in other Investment Plans whenever you like.
initialInvestment.question7: Can I choose different commitment periods for other Investment Plans?
initialInvestment.answer7: Absolutely! Participation in the initial investment promotion is separate to your other Investment Plans, so you can choose the amounts and terms for your other investments.

invest.question1: What is a Constant Investment Plan?
invest.answer1: Our Investment Plans are simple, risk-free, and effective ways to grow your money. You choose a commitment period, invest your money, and at the end of the period you get your money back plus earned investment income. It really is as simple as that.
invest.question2: How do Constant Investment Plans work?
invest.answer2:
Under the “INVEST” tab on our website, you’ll be able to choose from several different Investment Plans. Each one is designed to maintain the value of your principal investment and pay you daily investment income.


To maintain the value of your principal, we send your money to the Constant trust where it’s protected by US law and insured to $250,000. At the same time, we create a “digital dollar” called Constant and put it into your account, which keeps the value stable.


Over time, your Constant earns investment income which you can withdraw as you earn (daily) or save until the end of your commitment period. Either way, your final investment statement is an amount in Constant you can withdraw for its 1:1 equivalent in USD.


Of course, you don’t have to withdraw your principal and investment income as USD. At the end of your commitment period, when your investment matures, we reinvest your final balance into our Anytime Investment Plan so you continue to earn investment income while you decide what to do next.


You could send your Constant to someone else, anywhere in the world, keep it stored in your Anytime Investment Plan to keep the value locked to the USD, or simply put the Constant back into another Investment Plan to earn even more interest. The choice is yours!
invest.question3: How do you protect my investment?
invest.answer3: Your principal is securely held in the Constant Vault, which is overseen by an accredited US financial institution called Prime Trust. Your investment is FDIC-insured to $250,000. You can read more about the Constant Vault on our blog.
invest.answer4: We accept any currency sent to our US-based Constant Vault bank account. It is then converted to USD and stored in an FDIC-insured vault.
invest.question6: Can I access my principal investment at any time?
invest.answer6:
To give you the best guaranteed returns, we hold on to your principal for the duration of your commitment period. Think of your principal as a seed that we water and help grow. To do that, we need time, which is why we offer different Investment Plans so you can find the right one for you.


If you’d rather have continuous access to your principal, choose our Anytime Investment Plan – the rate is lower, but you can withdraw your money at any time.
invest.question7: Why do you digitize my investment?
invest.answer7:
When you invest money for the long term, some local currencies can lose value due to inflation. This eats into your investment income, diminishing your returns. We don’t think that’s fair. So instead, we convert your principal into a “digital dollar” that’s 100% backed by real USD – the world’s reserve currency.


Our digital dollar is called Constant. Anytime you invest or withdraw, we create or destroy Constant to ensure it’s 1:1 backed, so its value always matches the USD. That way, you never need worry about inflation and other economic pressures eating into your investment. You just sit back and watch your money grow.
invest.answer8:
First, we send your investment principal to the Constant Vault for safekeeping. Then, we create new Constant tokens on the Ethereum blockchain that match the USD value of your principal. For example, if you gave us the equivalent of $100 in your local currency, we send $100 to the Constant Vault and create 100 Constant.


Constant remains in your account for your commitment period, earning investment income that you can save or withdraw daily. Then, when your period ends, you can withdraw your principal from the Constant Vault (and any returns) and we’ll destroy the Constant. Or, if you’d rather use the Constant tokens to send money abroad, trade on exchanges, or reinvest for another period, please do!
invest.answer9: Your principal and investment income are stored inside the Constant Vault, which is regulated under US law and protected by $130,000,000 FDIC insurance (per account limit of $250,000 applies).
invest.question10: Can I add to my Investment Plan during the term?
invest.answer10: You can’t add to an Investment Plan once it’s started, but there’s no limit on how many Investment Plans you can have. So if you’d like to invest more, simply open another Investment Plan and watch your money grow.
invest.answer11: The Constant Vault is a publicly-audited trust overseen and managed by Prime Trust, a US accredited financial institution. The Constant Vault is regulated in the US and insured by the FDIC to the value of $130,000,000 (a per account limit of $250,000 applies).
invest.answer12: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) is a body set up by the US government to protect the integrity of the US financial system. It does this in a number of ways, including insuring deposits. Our Constant Vault is insured by FDIC to an indemnity limit of $130,000,000. You can read more about the FDIC on their website.

returns.question1: How are my returns paid out?
returns.answer1: We pay investment profit daily, so you can either wait until the end of your commitment period to withdraw your investment income or withdraw it daily. It’s up to you.
returns.question2: How are my daily returns calculated?
returns.answer2: Your rate of return is calculated by applying the percentage rate of your Investment Plan to the amount of your principal, and then dividing it by 365 to get a daily rate. Your returns are not compounded, so if you invest $500 for one year at a rate of 8%, you would earn $40 investment income at the end of your commitment period (about $0.1 per day).
returns.question3: How can I track my earnings?
returns.answer3: Just log into your account and click Your Investments. Total earned investment income is on the top right of the dashboard.
returns.question4: Will you increase ROI rates in the future?
returns.answer4:
You never know ;-)


As Constant grows, we’re always looking for new ways of improving our efficiency so we can give you the best returns on your investment.
returns.question5: How can you offer such high returns risk-free?
returns.answer5:
We pay investment income from earnings we make on our risk-free loans. We can afford to give you higher rates than most other low-risk investment products because we use technology to strip out inefficiency and accelerate returns.


As a tech company disrupting the investment sector, we don’t need branches, managers, or advisors. Instead, we use custom-designed blockchain technology to remove costly middlemen and intermediary processes, while still providing an auditable transaction history. As a result, we can afford to give much better returns on your investment.

general.answer1:
Constant is simple, risk-free, and rewarding investment.


Through blockchain technology, we’ve developed a suite of flexible investment products designed to grow your money at a pace that suits you. Whether you’re a seasoned investor or dipping your toe into it for the first time, Constant offers substantial returns with zero risk.


We’ve thrown out credit scoring, paperwork, and fees to give you more of what you deserve – industry-leading rates, risk-free loans, a stable, state-less currency, and free international transfers.

Available all day, every day, anywhere in the world.
general.answer2:
No. Constant is even better.


We’re 100% digital and open 24-7, so no queuing at bank branches, and no bank holidays.


Our Investment Plans earn you up to 60x more investment income than a typical savings account pays in interest.


We don’t run credit checks, we don’t give you reams of paperwork to sign, and we are open to anyone, anywhere.
general.answer3: Yes. Your investments are held securely in our trust, which is regulated under US law. That’s why we ask you to verify your identity when you withdraw investments to your bank account.
general.answer4: We charge interest on collateralized loans to pay you investment income, and make a very slim profit from the difference.
general.question5: Who are the people behind Constant?
general.answer5: We’re a diverse team of engineers, economists, monetary policymakers, and industry experts. You can read all about our team on About Us.
general.answer6: Everywhere! We are a registered US entity supported by a global team with presences in the USA, Vietnam, and Malta. If you’re in our neighborhood, drop by anytime.

stories.quote0: I’ve never used anything like Constant before. The interest rate is high. Everything is good. Your money will be protected well and be much more profitable than traditional bank saving.
stories.quote1: Great user experience. It's always fun watching my interest grow, and super convenient that I can withdraw it anytime. A nice zero-risk companion to your other investments, and a decent enough investment in itself.
stories.title1: Father of three, saving for his children's college tuition.
stories.quote2: Can't rate the Constant support staff highly enough. They walked me through making my first deposit - which was much easier than expected.
stories.title2: Mechanic, saving to take his wife away on her dream holiday to Thailand.
stories.quote3: Very promising service. It's cool that my friends in different countries can all get accounts easily, and that you can transfer Constant between them for free - this is the first service we've found that's actually global.
stories.title3: Graphic Designer, saving for a deposit to buy her first apartment.
stories.quote4: Apart from the bank beating interest rates, this is an incredibly interesting project from a technology standpoint. Banks need to up their game.
stories.title4: Engineer, saving for a new car to take his family on roadtrips.
stories.quote5: Love that there's no minimum deposit required so anyone can benefit from their rates. Feel much safer keeping the tips I make with Constant instead of in a box under my bed!
stories.title5: Student, saving for her final year's course fees.
stories.quote6: I signed up and made a deposit in under 5 minutes. Great for people who don't have the experience or time to invest, but still want to be smart with their money.

exchangeInputBuyTrialForm.title: We’re giving you a 1000 USD free initial investment. Just so you can see how it works. At the end of the trial, you keep all the returns.
exchangeInputBuyTrialForm.btnDesc: New customers only. This 1000 USD trial deposit will be returned at the end of your chosen term, but you keep all the interest.

saving.title: Invest the way you want.
saving.subTitle: The right investment is the one you’re comfortable with. The one that grows reliably over time. Select an option that feels good, and we’ll teach your money how to work for you.

info.title: Withdraw in any currency.
info.desc1: Your funds are held in USD, and can be withdrawn at any time. If you’ve got a different local currency, it’s converted at the real-time market rate, so you preserve the full value of your funds.
info.desc2: If you’d like to move your money to another bank account, that’s fine too - just let us know where to send it.

what.whatDesc0: When you hit the withdraw button, Constant converts stored USD into local currency that you can pull out at bank branches or ATMs.
what.whatDesc1: The Constant global bank account integrates smoothly with your local banking system, allowing you to smoothly transfer funds if you wish.
what.whatDesc2: Because your money is stored in USD, when you withdraw in your local currency, you’ll find that the value of your money has stayed Constant.
what.whatDesc3: Withdraw as often as you like. The only fee we charge is a 0.25% withdrawal fee - capped at $35. Never more.

info.title: Send money to anyone, anywhere. For free.
info.desc1: Having a global USD account means that your money can move freely all over the world. No matter how much you send - or how often - it won’t cost you a cent.
info.desc2: When it reaches the other party, they don’t pay anything either. So send money home, do business with the world, and get it done instantly. That’s what it means to be global.

deposit.title: Your global USD bank account. Available now in Vietnam.

subTitle.sub1: Save in US dollars, instead of unstable local currencies. Enjoy instant transfers of any amount - to anyone or any business - anywhere in the world. For free.
subTitle.sub2: Your account is backed by the full faith and credit of the United States government, insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC). Established in 1933, the FDIC has a perfect record of no lost funds.  {learnMore}

what.whatCaption0: Protect the value of your money
what.whatCaption1: Move your money anywhere for free
what.whatDesc0: Save in USD, the world reserve currency, accepted by merchants worldwide. Protect your money against inflation and instability.
what.whatDesc1: Send and receive any amount, anywhere in the world, instantly and for free. Do bigger business, send money home, unlock greater mobility.
what.whatDesc2: Benefit from the maximum coverage the FDIC provides - multiplied by 20. Since the FDIC insures each account up to $250K, we store your money across 20 of them.
what.whatDesc3: Constant works with your local banking system to make sure that all your funds can be withdrawn anytime, in your currency of choice.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.desc1: Send any currency to your local Constant Trust. If it’s not USD, we convert it.
howItWorks.desc2: Your USD funds are held safely in fully insured US bank accounts.
howItWorks.desc3: Now you have a global USD account with free transfers and unlimited withdrawals.

checklist.title: Why you should save money with Constant.
checklist.subTitle: Smarter than your average bank.
checklist.desc1: Like traditional banks, we reward you with interest earnings on our collateralized loans. Unlike traditional banks, we give you most of it - since it’s your money, really.
checklist.desc2: And because we replaced cashiers with code, advisors with algorithms, and switched out bricks and mortar for the blockchain - we can pass the savings directly on to you.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.subTitle: We’re building a fairer, freer, financial system.
howWeWork.desc:
As pioneers of borderless banking on the blockchain, we are committed to making banking more inclusive, money more useful, and growth more accessible to anyone, anywhere in the world.

What does that look like? Fair interest rates. Inclusive loans. A state-less, stable currency that you can save, borrow, and spend. Transactions secured and carried out collectively by users of the network. A bank for the people, made possible by the people.

Constant is proud to be 100% digital, online 24/7. So no queuing at bank branches, and no bank holidays. Our team of economists, designers, engineers and industry experts write code, policy and efficient software in major cities around the globe. If you’re in the neighborhood, drop by anytime.

yourSaving.hello: Hello {name}. Let's see how your money is doing today.

contact.title: Get the capital you need for your PO, even when banks say no.
contact.desc: At a low, simple and transparent 0.5% per week.

placeholder.companyName: What's the name of your company?
placeholder.poName: What's the PO value we can help fund?
placeholder.companyExciting: What's exciting about your company today?
placeholder.companyTarget: What's your company looking forward to?

what.whatCaption1: No credit check on you or your business
what.whatCaption2: The world’s lowest PO financing rate
what.whatTitle: What can you do with Constant?
what.whatDesc1: Banks require good credit based on a solid financial history. That’s not always possible for young businesses. That’s why Constant finances loans based on the creditworthiness of your customers.
what.whatDesc0: Banks can take weeks or even months to approve a business loan. Your PO can’t wait that long. Constant helps you seize that opportunity.
what.whatDesc2: The beauty of being 100% digital is that we can offer low interest rates on a global scale. No matter how big or small your business is.
what.whatDesc3: Bank loans lack flexibility. If you need more cash, you’ll need a new loan. Constant gives you a line of credit based on your sales volume, and your track record of growth.
what.whatMore0: How we guarantee zero risk high returns
what.whatMore2: How to pick a plan that’s right for you
what.whatMore3: How people are saving with Constant

howItWorks.title1: SECURE A PURCHASE ORDER FROM YOUR CUSTOMER
howItWorks.desc1: Congrats! This is a growth opportunity that you can easily seize.
howItWorks.desc2: Apply in less than 5 minutes by submitting the PO, with basic details about your business and customers.
howItWorks.title3: GET THE CAPITAL TO FULFILL YOUR PO
howItWorks.desc3: Enjoy quick turnaround. Finance up to 100% of your POs and stay competitive.  Rinse and repeat for your next order.

borrow.blockDesc2:
Secure cash with purchase orders.

We understand that money is fast flowing. If you sell products to reputable clients - established companies, government organizations, or similar - we can fund you the working capital you need to fulfill those orders, in confidence of future payment from your client.

brands.title: Our clients work with some of the world’s leading brands

trade.title: Trade Constant.
trade.desc: Protect yourself against volatility and access smarter financial solutions. Constant Coin (CONST) is the stablecoin that at the heart of all our services: a global USD bank account, high income investments and fair, flexible loans. CONST is fully backed by USD, holds its value at 1:1, and can be redeemed for USD at anytime. You can get CONST for Bitcoin, Ether, fiat and more, by using the reputable exchanges listed below.

coinmarket.title: Follow the growth of Constant
coinmarket.desc: Get real-time prices, review historical charts, and track movement and volume across all exchanges.
